templates.name: C9300-TARGET-Prep
templates.templateContent:
## Install prep4dnac command in file system for manual recall when necessary
! Remove any confirmation dialogs when accessing flash
file prompt quiet
!
no event manager applet prep4dnac
event manager applet prep4dnac
 event none sync yes
 action 1010 syslog msg "Starting: 'prep4dnac'  EEM applet."
 action 1020 puts "Preparing device to be discovered by device automation - This script will reboot the device."
 action 2010 cli command "enable"
 action 2020 puts "Saving config to update BOOT param."
 action 2030 cli command "write"
 action 3010 puts "Erasing startup-config."
 action 3020 cli command "wr er" pattern "confirm"
 action 3030 cli command "y"
 action 4010 puts "Clearing crypto keys."
 action 4020 cli command "config t"
 action 4030 cli command "crypto key zeroize" pattern "yes/no"
 action 4040 cli command "y"
 action 5010 puts "Clearing crypto PKI stuff."
 action 5020 cli command "no crypto pki cert pool" pattern "yes/no"
 action 5030 cli command "y"
 action 5040 cli command "exit"
 action 6010 puts "Deleting vlan.dat file."
 action 6020 cli command "delete /force vlan.dat"
 action 6030 puts "Deleting certificate files in NVRAM."
 action 6040 cli command "delete /force nvram:*.cer"
 action 6050 puts "Deleting PnP files"
 action 6060 cli command "delete /force flash:pnp*"
 action 6070 cli command "delete /force nvram:pnp*"
 action 7010 puts "Reseting Stack Priority"
 action 7020 cli command "switch 1 priority 1"
 action 8010 puts "Device is prepared for being discovered by device automation.  Rebooting."
 action 8020 syslog msg "Stopping: 'prep4dnac' EEM applet."
 action 8030 reload
exit
!
alias exec prep4dnac event manager run prep4dnac
!
##Troubleshooting Section below remove the hashes to user
##event manager applet CLI_COMMANDS-->
##event cli pattern ".*" sync no skip no
##action 1 syslog msg "$_cli_msg"
!
!Install command and reboot for claim
event manager applet POST_PNP
 event timer countdown time 300
 action 1.0 cli command "enable"
 action 1.1 cli command "prep4dnac"
 action 1.2 cli command "exit

templates.name: C9300-DIST-Post
templates.templateContent:
##C9300-2 Post pnp
!
interface range gi 1/0/10-11
   channel-group 1 mode active
!
interface Port-channel1
   port-channel standalone-disable
!
templates.promotedTemplateContent:
##C9300-2 Post pnp
!
interface range gi 1/0/10-11
   channel-group 1 mode active
!
interface Port-channel1
   port-channel standalone-disable
!

templates.name: ISR-Prep
templates.templateContent:
##Shutdown Other Interface to create distribution from Cat9300-2
!
##disable port 0/0/1 for the templating lab
int gi 0/0/1
 shutdown
 end
!
templates.promotedTemplateContent:
##Shutdown Other Interface to create distribution from Cat9300-2
!
##disable port 0/0/1 for the templating lab
int gi 0/0/1
 shutdown
 end
!

templates.name: C9300-DIST-Prep
templates.templateContent:
##Build Distribution for pnp
vlan 5
name "mgntvlan"
vlan 10
name "apvlan"
vlan 20
name "datavlan"
vlan 30
name "voicevlan"
vlan 40
name "guestvlan"
vlan 999
name "disabled"
!
int vlan 5 
 ip address 192.168.5.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
!
pnp startup-vlan 5
!
int vlan 10 
 ip address 192.168.10.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
int vlan 20 
 ip address 192.168.20.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
int vlan 30 
 ip address 192.168.30.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
int vlan 40
 ip address 192.168.40.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
int vlan 999
 ip address 192.168.99.1 255.255.255.0
 ip helper-address 198.18.133.1                  
 ip ospf 1 area 0
 no shutdown
!
#INTERACTIVE
autoconf enable<IQ>yes<R>y
#END_INTERACTIVE
!
parameter-map type subscriber attribute-to-service BUILTIN_DEVICE_TO_TEMPLATE
10 map device-type regex "Cisco-IP-Phone"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
20 map device-type regex "Cisco-IP-Camera"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
30 map device-type regex "Cisco-DMP"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
40 map oui eq "00.0f.44"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
50 map oui eq "00.23.ac"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
60 map device-type regex "Cisco-AIR-AP"
 20 interface-template ACCESS_POINT
70 map device-type regex "Cisco-AIR-LAP"
 20 interface-template ACCESS_POINT
80 map device-type regex "Cisco-TelePresence"
 20 interface-template WORKSTATION
90 map device-type regex "Surveillance-Camera"
 10 interface-template WORKSTATION
100 map device-type regex "Video-Conference"
 10 interface-template WORKSTATION
110 map device-type regex "Cisco-CAT-LAP"
 10 interface-template ACCESS_POINT
!
##Templates
template ACCESS_POINT
 description Access Point Interface
 switchport trunk native vlan 10
 switchport trunk allowed vlan 10,20,30,40,999
 switchport mode trunk
!
template WORKSTATION
 description Workstation
 switchport access vlan 20
 switchport mode access
 switchport voice vlan 30
!
template GUEST
 description Guest Interface
 switchport access vlan 40
 switchport mode access
!
template BASECONFIG
 description BASE CONFIG
 switchport access vlan 999
 switchport mode access
!
##Macros
## Use Bind to Source variable to select access interfaces 
#macro( access_interface )
 description BASE CONFIG
 switchport access vlan 999
 switchport mode access
 switchport port-security maximum 3
 switchport port-security
 snmp trap mac-notification change added
 snmp trap mac-notification change removed
 spanning-tree portfast
 spanning-tree bpduguard enable
 source template BASECONFIG
#end
!
interface range gi 1/0/10-11
 description PnP Test Environment to Catalyst 9300
 switchport mode trunk
 switchport trunk native vlan 5
 switchport trunk allowed vlan 5,10,20,30,40,999
 channel-protocol lacp
 channel-group 1 mode passive
 access-session inherit disable autoconf
!
interface Port-channel1
 description PnP Test Environment to Catalyst 9300
 switchport trunk native vlan 5
 switchport trunk allowed vlan 5,10,20,30,40,999
 switchport mode trunk
 no port-channel standalone-disable
!
interface gi 1/0/48
 access-session inherit disable autoconf
!
##Access Port Configuration
interface range gi 1/0/1 - 9
 #access_interface
!
